div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1592 Madaba (anc. Madeba), c. 30 km. S of Amman, c. 1919 Burial: after 146 B.C. (Westermark) Contents: 6+ AR Ptolemy I: 1 tetradr. (as Svoronos 185) Ptolemy II: 1 tetradr. (as Sv. 740) Ptolemy IV: 1 tetradr. (as Sv. 848-52, var. with NE) Ptolemy V: 2 tetradr. (as Sv. 1250, 1284) Ptolemy VI: 1 tetradr. (Newell's identifica- tion. Sv. 1489) Disposition: London 6 Jenkins, INCJ, p. 69, note 26 (latest coin Ptolemy VI, not Ptolemy V as stated)
